mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT D.EDCTS_CD,D.PLAN_CD, P.PAPRD_DT, D.LINE_CD, D.ORDER_CNT, D.INDICA_CNT, PRDT_NM, PREF_RANK, WK_FR_DT,BOM_CD FROM PLAN_DTL D JOIN PLAN P ON P.PLAN_CD = D.PLAN_CD JOIN EDCTS E ON D.EDCTS_CD = E.EDCTS_CD JOIN BOM B ON B.EDCTS_CD = E.EDCTS_CD WHERE P.NOW_ST = '미진행'
SELECT B.PRCS_CD, B.RSC_CD, L.LOT_CD, L.LOT_RMN_CNT, L.HOLD_CNT, B.USE_CNT FROM BOM B JOIN RSC_LOT L ON B.RSC_CD = L.RSC_CD WHERE B.EDCTS_CD = #{edctsCd}
